desc: Orchard mason bees for sale, mason bee cocoons, mason bee houses. Attract gentle mason bees, natural pollination of gardens, fruit trees, crops

layout.text: Reward yourself with a bountiful harvest
As our population grows and our farmland area shrinks it is more than ever important to Grow more Food in our urban environment.
Improving food production in our urban environment requires higher pollination rates. By increasing pollination rates, growers can achieve larger harvests of tastier produce.
Increased pollination can be achieved through the use of Mason bees and Leafcutter bees which are both excellent pollinators.
You will be amazed at the results.
